model.BoardPack

Class StaticBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.BoardPack.Board
      • model.BoardPack.StaticBoard

  • public class StaticBoard
extends Board
    The StaticBoard was the early version which uses a byte[][] array for the boardArray variable. That means it is not meant to expand the board. Now it is only still used in the Gif.java to create .gif files.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class model.BoardPack.Board

    • Constructor Detail

      • StaticBoard

        public StaticBoard()
        Board constructors. Which uses set values, or rows and colums parameters or copies and converts a array consisting of 0s and 1s; Handles outer column and outer row of the arrays by adding two extra rows and columns consisting of 0s.

      • StaticBoard

        public StaticBoard(int row,
                   int columns)
        Constructor that takes the dimensions as parameters. Initializes a boardArray which is filled with 0s.
        Parameters:
        row - desired how many cells on top of each other in the Board + zeroRow
        columns - how many cells side by side of each other in the Board + zeroColumn

      • StaticBoard

        public StaticBoard(int numOfProcessors)
        Constructor that creates a StaticBoard with dimensions that are related to the number of available processors.
        Parameters:
        numOfProcessors - the computer's number of processors.

      • StaticBoard

        public StaticBoard(byte[][] board)
        Board constructor which formats a board to use a byte array.
        Parameters:
        board - takes a array of 0s and 1s, and converts it into a Board object

      • StaticBoard

        public StaticBoard(byte[][] array,
                   int[] bounding)
        Uses the bounding box, bounding to create a new 2D array where the size of the array, is determined by the bounding box.
        Parameters:
        array - to compress
        bounding - outer bounds which decides compression.
        See Also:
        Board.getBoundingBox()

      • getBoundingBox

        public int[] getBoundingBox()
        Collects the outer sizes of an 2D array where there are active elements. So that an array with large white spaces can be compressed to fit exactly to the active elements. boundingBox[4] // minrow maxrow mincolumn maxcolumn
        Specified by:
        getBoundingBox in class Board
        Returns:
        an array witch describes where the active rows and columns start and end.

      • setCellValue

        public void setCellValue(int cellX,
                         int cellY,
                         boolean erase,
                         int Maxsize)
        Description copied from class: Board
        Alters the cell state of a specific cell, identified by row and col. The erase determines if the alteration should be 0 into 1 (false) or 1 into 0 (true). If row or col is outside of the bounds of the boardArray, rows or columns are added at the side of the boardArray which is selected.
        Specified by:
        setCellValue in class Board
        Parameters:
        cellX - the row of the current cell
        cellY - the column of the current cell
        erase - erases (1 into 0) if true or draws (0 into 1) if false
        Maxsize - when the Board will no longer expand on mouseclick.

      • setNewGenValues

        public void setNewGenValues()
        Description copied from class: Board
        Changes the current boardArray to its nextGenaration by placing new values into the boardArray. Comparing the neighBoard with its corresponding boarArray cell state. Then using the Rules.rleRules() to determine the new state of the cells.
        Specified by:
        setNewGenValues in class Board
        See Also:
        Rule.rleRules(int, int)

      • createNeighBoard

        public void createNeighBoard()
        Description copied from class: Board
        Creates a new blank neighBoard with the same height and width as the main board. This is later updated with the number of neighbors to each cell.
        Specified by:
        createNeighBoard in class Board

      • countNeighbhours

        public void countNeighbhours(int row,
                             int col)
        Description copied from class: Board
        Adds +1 to all cells in the neighboring cell of an alive cell. This in the end determines how many neighboring alive cell each cell has.
        Specified by:
        countNeighbhours in class Board
        Parameters:
        row - index
        col - index

      • updateNeighbourBoard

        public void updateNeighbourBoard()
        Description copied from class: Board
        Creates an array containing the number of neighbors for each cell. The array containing information about the number of neighbors is used to calculate the next generation of the main board (boardArray).
        Specified by:
        updateNeighbourBoard in class Board

      • sizeTest

        public void sizeTest()
        Description copied from class: Board
        Checks if dimensions of the boardArray exceeds a certain limit. If the provided limit (in this case, 2000) is exceeded, the outer rows and columns are set to 0 to limit the dimensions of the boardArray to the given constant (in this case, 2000).
        Specified by:
        sizeTest in class Board
        See Also:
        DynamicBoard.boardArray
